tags.name: Pickup_other
tags.description:
Using the Pickup API, applications can schedule pickups, manage previously scheduled pickups, or cancel previously scheduled pickups.
Business Rules
Appendix
Errors
GitHub - view sample integration code

post.description: Using the Pickup API, applications can schedule pickups, manage previously scheduled pickups, or cancel previously scheduled pickups.

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the API. Valid values v1

parameters.name: pickuptype
parameters.description:
Type of pickup. Valid values:
oncall
smart
both. Length 6

requestBody.description: Generate sample code for popular API requests by selecting an example below. To view a full sample request and response, first click "Authorize" and enter your application credentials, then populate the required parameters above and click "Try it out".

oauth2.description:
Find your Client ID and Secret on your app info page.
1. Select \"Try It\"
2. In the Security section enter your Client ID and Secret.
3. Select \"Request Token\"
4. Enter any additional information in the Body and Parameters sections.
5. Select \"Send\" to execute your API request

AlternateAddressIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is different than the address specified in the customer's profile.  
Valid values:
Y = Alternate address
N = Original pickup address (default)

ServiceDateOption.description:
Indicates the pickup timeframe.
01 = Same-Day Pickup
02 = Future-Day Pickup
03 = A Specific-Day Pickup  If 03 is selected, then PickupDate, EarliestReadyTime, and LatestClosetime must be specified.

TaxInformationIndicator.description:
Indicates whether to return detailed taxes for on-callpickups.
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with taxes
N = Do not rate this pickup with taxes (default)

UserLevelDiscountIndicator.description:
Indicates whether to return user level promo discount for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with user level promo discount
N = Do not rate this pickup with user level promo discount(default)

PickupRateRequest.description: This request is used to rate an on-callpickup.

SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description. Supported values: 1607, 1707,2007

Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January

Request_SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description. Supported values: 1607, 1707,2007

Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

TransactionReference_CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

AccountNumber.description: UPS account number.  Shipper's (requester of the pickup) UPS account number

AccountCountryCode.description:
Country code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

ShipperAccount_AccountNumber.description: UPS account number.  Shipper's (requester of the pickup) UPS account number

ShipperAccount_AccountCountryCode.description:
Country code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

AddressLine.description:
Detailed street address. 
For Jan. 2010 release, only one AddressLine is allowed.

PostalCode.description: Postal code for countries with postal codes.

CountryCode.description:
Upper-case two-char long country code as defined by ISO-3166. 
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is commerical or residential.
Valid values:
Y = Residential address
N = Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

PickupRateRequest_PickupAddress.description: The address to pickup the packages

PickupAddress_AddressLine.description:
Detailed street address. 
For Jan. 2010 release, only one AddressLine is allowed.

PickupAddress_CountryCode.description:
Upper-case two-char long country code as defined by ISO-3166. 
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

PickupRateRequest_AlternateAddressIndica.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is different than the address specified in the customer's profile.  
Valid values:
Y = Alternate address
N = Original pickup address (default)

PickupRateRequest_ServiceDateOption.description:
Indicates the pickup timeframe.
01 = Same-Day Pickup
02 = Future-Day Pickup
03 = A Specific-Day Pickup  If 03 is selected, then PickupDate, EarliestReadyTime, and LatestClosetime must be specified.

CloseTime.description:
The latest local close time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

ReadyTime.description:
The earliest local ready Time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

PickupDate.description:
The specific local pickup date.
Format: yyyyMMdd
yyyy = Year Applicable
MM = 01�12
dd = 01�31

PickupRateRequest_PickupDateInfo.description:
Required if the ServiceDateOption is: 
03 A Specific-Day Pickup

PickupDateInfo_PickupDate.description:
The specific local pickup date.
Format: yyyyMMdd
yyyy = Year Applicable
MM = 01�12
dd = 01�31

PickupRateRequest_TaxInformationIndicato.description:
Indicates whether to return detailed taxes for on-callpickups.
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with taxes
N = Do not rate this pickup with taxes (default)

PickupRateRequest_UserLevelDiscountIndic.description:
Indicates whether to return user level promo discount for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with user level promo discount
N = Do not rate this pickup with user level promo discount(default)

WeekendServiceTerritoryIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 1607.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = WST
N = Non-WST

Code.description: Identifies the success of the transaction.1 = Success

ResponseStatus_Code.description: Identifies the success of the transaction.1 = Success

Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system.

Response_Alert.description: Alert Container. There can be zero to many alert containers with code and description.

Alert_Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Alert_Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system.

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

RateType.description:
Indicates the pickup is rated as same-day or future-day pickup.
SD = Same-day Pickup
FD = Future-day Pickup

CurrencyCode.description: IATA currency codes for the pickup charge. Such as USD

GrandTotalOfAllCharge.description: The grand total of each charge and applied tax.

GrandTotalOfAllIncentedCharge.description: The grand total of each incented charge and applied tax. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

PreTaxTotalCharge.description: Total of charges before taxes. Only present when tax details requested in input.

PreTaxTotalIncentedCharge.description: Total of incented charges before taxes. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

PickupRateResponse_RateResult.description: The result of rating an on-callpickup.

RateResult_RateType.description:
Indicates the pickup is rated as same-day or future-day pickup.
SD = Same-day Pickup
FD = Future-day Pickup

RateResult_CurrencyCode.description: IATA currency codes for the pickup charge. Such as USD

ChargeCode.description:
Indicates the general charge type
A = ACCESSORIAL TYPE
B = BASE CHARGE TYPE
S = SURCHARGE TYPE

ChargeDescription.description:
Description of each charge.The possible descriptions are:
BASE CHARGE
EXTENDED AREA SURCHARGE
FUEL SURCHARGE
REMOTE AREA SURCHARGE
RESIDENTIAL SURCHARGE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SATURDAY ON-CALL STOP CHARGE

IncentedAmount.description: Monetary value of the incented charge. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

TaxAmount.description: Monetary value of the tax if apply.

ChargeDetail_ChargeCode.description:
Indicates the general charge type
A = ACCESSORIAL TYPE
B = BASE CHARGE TYPE
S = SURCHARGE TYPE

ChargeDetail_ChargeDescription.description:
Description of each charge.The possible descriptions are:
BASE CHARGE
EXTENDED AREA SURCHARGE
FUEL SURCHARGE
REMOTE AREA SURCHARGE
RESIDENTIAL SURCHARGE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SATURDAY ON-CALL STOP CHARGE

ChargeDetail_IncentedAmount.description: Monetary value of the incented charge. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

ChargeDetail_TaxAmount.description: Monetary value of the tax if apply.

Type.description:
Type of Tax code. 
Valid values: ALV, BTW, DDS, DDV, DPH, FPA, GST, IVA, IVA1, IVA2, IVA3, KM, MOMS, MWST, PDV, PST, PVM, PVN, QST, TVA, VAT, VSK.

RateResult_TaxCharges.description: Container to hold taxes when, detailed taxes are request via RateTaxIndicator.

TaxCharges_Type.description:
Type of Tax code. 
Valid values: ALV, BTW, DDS, DDV, DPH, FPA, GST, IVA, IVA1, IVA2, IVA3, KM, MOMS, MWST, PDV, PST, PVM, PVN, QST, TVA, VAT, VSK.

RateResult_GrandTotalOfAllCharge.description: The grand total of each charge and applied tax.

RateResult_GrandTotalOfAllIncentedCharge.description: The grand total of each incented charge and applied tax. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

RateResult_PreTaxTotalCharge.description: Total of charges before taxes. Only present when tax details requested in input.

RateResult_PreTaxTotalIncentedCharge.description: Total of incented charges before taxes. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

PickupRateResponse_WeekendServiceTerrito.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 1607.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = WST
N = Non-WST

SatWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Saturday WST
N = Non-Saturday WST

SunWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Sunday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Sunday WST
N = Non-Sunday WST

PickupRateResponse_WeekendServiceTerrito.description: WeekendServiceTerritory Container.Returned if the  subversion greater or equal to 2007.

WeekendServiceTerritory_SatWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Saturday WST
N = Non-Saturday WST

WeekendServiceTerritory_SunWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Sunday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Sunday WST
N = Non-Sunday WST

CancelBy.description:
Cancel pickup by Pickup Request Number (PRN).
01= Account Number                                             02 = PRN

PRN.description:
The pickup request number (PRN) generated by UPS pickup system.
Required if CancelBy = 02

PickupCancelRequest.description: This request is to cancel an on-callpickup.

PickupCancelRequest_CancelBy.description:
Cancel pickup by Pickup Request Number (PRN).
01= Account Number                                             02 = PRN

PickupCancelRequest_PRN.description:
The pickup request number (PRN) generated by UPS pickup system.
Required if CancelBy = 02

PickupType.description:
The type of pickup that has been cancelled.
01 = On-Call Pickup

PickupCancelResponse_PickupType.description:
The type of pickup that has been cancelled.
01 = On-Call Pickup

Code.description:
The status code defined by operation system.
001 = User Triggered
002 = User Cancelled
003 = Completed
004 = Missed
005 = Not In
006 = Not Ready
007 = Closed
008 = Cancelled By Driver
999 = Unknown

PickupCancelResponse_GWNStatus.description: The status of Smart Pickup that has been cancelled.

GWNStatus_Code.description:
The status code defined by operation system.
001 = User Triggered
002 = User Cancelled
003 = Completed
004 = Missed
005 = Not In
006 = Not Ready
007 = Closed
008 = Cancelled By Driver
999 = Unknown

RatePickupIndicator.description:
Indicates whether to rate the on-callpickup or not. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup
N = Do not rate this pickup (default)

TaxInformationIndicator.description:
Indicates whether to return detailed taxes for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with taxes
N = Do not rate this pickup with taxes (default)

UserLevelDiscountIndicator.description:
Indicates whether to return user level promo discount for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with user level promo discount
N = Do not rate this pickup with user level promo discount(default)

AlternateAddressIndicator.description:
Indicates if pickup address is a different address than that specified in a customer's profile. 
Valid values:
Y = Alternate address
N = Original pickup address (default)

OverweightIndicator.description:
Indicates if at least any package is over 70 lbs or 32 kgs. 
Valid values: 
Y = Over weight 
N = Not over weight (default)  Not required for WWEF service.

PaymentMethod.description:
The payment method to pay for this on call pickup.
00 = No payment needed
01 = Pay by shipper account
03 = Pay by charge card
04 = Pay by 1Z tracking number
05 = Pay by check or money order
06 = Cash(applicable only for these countries - BE,FR,DE,IT,MX,NL,PL,ES,GB,CZ,HU,FI,NO)
07=Pay by PayPal
Refer to Appendix # for valid payment methods for CZ, HU, FI and NO
  For countries and (or) zip codes where pickup is free of charge, please submit 00, means no payment needed as payment method. 
- If 01 is the payment method, then ShipperAccountNumber and ShipperAccount CountryCode must be provided.
- If 03 is selected, then CreditCard information should be provided.
- If 04 is selected, then the shipper agreed to pay for the pickup packages.
- If 05 is selected, then the shipper will pay for the pickup packages with a check or money order.

SpecialInstruction.description: Special handling instruction from the customer

ReferenceNumber.description: Information entered by a customer for Privileged reference

ServiceCategory.description:
Service Category.
Applicable to the following countries:
BE, FR, DE, IT, MX, NL, PL, ES, GB 
Valid values: 
01 - domestic (default)
02 - international
03 - transborder

CashType.description:
Describes the type of cash funds that the driver will collect.
Applicable to the following countries:
BE,FR,DE,IT,MX,NL,PL,ES,GB
Valid values: 
01 - Pickup only (default)
02 - Transportation only
03 - Pickup and Transportation

ShippingLabelsAvailable.description: This element should be set to �Y� in the request to indicate that user has pre-printed shipping labels for all the packages, otherwise this will be treated as false.

PickupCreationRequest.description: This request is for scheduling an on-call pickup

SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description. Supported values: 1607, 1707,2007

Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January

PickupCreationRequest_RatePickupIndicato.description:
Indicates whether to rate the on-callpickup or not. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup
N = Do not rate this pickup (default)

PickupCreationRequest_TaxInformationIndi.description:
Indicates whether to return detailed taxes for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with taxes
N = Do not rate this pickup with taxes (default)

PickupCreationRequest_UserLevelDiscountI.description:
Indicates whether to return user level promo discount for the on-callpickups. 
Valid values:
Y = Rate this pickup with user level promo discount
N = Do not rate this pickup with user level promo discount(default)

PickupCreationRequest_Shipper.description:
On-call pickup shipper or requestor information.   Must provide when choose to pay the pickup by shipper account number, BillThirdParty account number, or BillReceiver account number. 
It is optional if the shipper chooses any other payment method. However, it is highly recommended to provide if available.

AccountNumber.description: UPS account number.  Shipper's (requester of the pickup) UPS account number

AccountCountryCode.description:
Country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Terriotry Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

Shipper_Account.description:
Shipper account information. 
Must provide when choose to pay the pickup by shipper account number

Account_AccountNumber.description: UPS account number.  Shipper's (requester of the pickup) UPS account number

Account_AccountCountryCode.description:
Country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Terriotry Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

CardHolderName.description: Charge card holder name. If the name is not provided, defaults to "No Name Provided".

CardType.description:
Charge card type. Valid values:
01 = American Express
03 = Discover
04 = Mastercard
06 = VISA  Discover card Pickup country US only.

CardNumber.description: Charge card number.  For Privileged clients, this element must be tokenized card number.

ExpirationDate.description:
Credit card expiration date.
Format: yyyyMM
yyyy = 4 digit year, valid value current year - 10 years.
MM = 2 digit month, valid values 01-12

SecurityCode.description:
Three or four digits that can be found either on top of credit card number or on the back of credit card. 
Number of digits varies for different type of credit card.  Valid values are 3 or 4 digits.
Security code is required if credit card information is provided.

Shipper_ChargeCard.description: Container for Charge Card payment method  Required if Payment method is 03. Credit/Charge card payment is valid for US, CA, PR and GB origin pickups.

ChargeCard_CardHolderName.description: Charge card holder name. If the name is not provided, defaults to "No Name Provided".

ChargeCard_CardType.description:
Charge card type. Valid values:
01 = American Express
03 = Discover
04 = Mastercard
06 = VISA  Discover card Pickup country US only.

ChargeCard_CardNumber.description: Charge card number.  For Privileged clients, this element must be tokenized card number.

ChargeCard_ExpirationDate.description:
Credit card expiration date.
Format: yyyyMM
yyyy = 4 digit year, valid value current year - 10 years.
MM = 2 digit month, valid values 01-12

ChargeCard_SecurityCode.description:
Three or four digits that can be found either on top of credit card number or on the back of credit card. 
Number of digits varies for different type of credit card.  Valid values are 3 or 4 digits.
Security code is required if credit card information is provided.

AddressLine.description: Address Lines of the credit card billing address.  Max of three address lines can be provided.

StateProvince.description: Charge card billing State province code

PostalCode.description: Charge card billing address postal code.  This is a required field for postal countries.

CountryCode.description:
Charge card billing address country or territory code defined by ISO-3166.
  Upper-case two letter string. For Discover card it should be US.

ChargeCard_CardAddress.description: Container to hold the Charge card address.

CardAddress_AddressLine.description: Address Lines of the credit card billing address.  Max of three address lines can be provided.

CardAddress_StateProvince.description: Charge card billing State province code

CardAddress_PostalCode.description: Charge card billing address postal code.  This is a required field for postal countries.

CardAddress_CountryCode.description:
Charge card billing address country or territory code defined by ISO-3166.
  Upper-case two letter string. For Discover card it should be US.

CloseTime.description:
Pickup location's local close time.
- User provided Close Time must be later than the Earliest Allowed Customer Close Time. 
- Earliest Allowed Customer Close Time is defined by UPS pickup operation system. 
- CloseTime minus ReadyTime must be greater than the LeadTime. 
- LeadTime is determined by UPS pickup operation system. LeadTime is the minimum amount of time UPS requires between customer�s request for a pickup and driver arriving at the location for the pickup.  Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

ReadyTime.description:
Pickup location's local ready time. 
ReadyTime means the time when your shipment(s) can be ready for UPS to pick up. 
- User provided ReadyTime must be earlier than CallByTime. 
- CallByTime is determined by UPS pickup operation system. CallByTime is the Latest time a Customer can call UPS or self-serve on UPS.com and complete a Pickup Request and UPS can still make the Pickup service request. 
- If ReadyTime is earlier than current local time, UPS uses the current local time as the ReadyTime.  Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

PickupDate.description:
Local pickup date of the location.  Format: yyyyMMdd
yyyy = Year Appliable
MM = 01� 12
dd = 01�31

PickupCreationRequest_PickupDateInfo.description: The container of desired pickup date

PickupDateInfo_CloseTime.description:
Pickup location's local close time.
- User provided Close Time must be later than the Earliest Allowed Customer Close Time. 
- Earliest Allowed Customer Close Time is defined by UPS pickup operation system. 
- CloseTime minus ReadyTime must be greater than the LeadTime. 
- LeadTime is determined by UPS pickup operation system. LeadTime is the minimum amount of time UPS requires between customer�s request for a pickup and driver arriving at the location for the pickup.  Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

PickupDateInfo_ReadyTime.description:
Pickup location's local ready time. 
ReadyTime means the time when your shipment(s) can be ready for UPS to pick up. 
- User provided ReadyTime must be earlier than CallByTime. 
- CallByTime is determined by UPS pickup operation system. CallByTime is the Latest time a Customer can call UPS or self-serve on UPS.com and complete a Pickup Request and UPS can still make the Pickup service request. 
- If ReadyTime is earlier than current local time, UPS uses the current local time as the ReadyTime.  Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

AddressLine.description: Detailed street address. For Jan. 2010 release, only one AddressLine is allowed

StateProvince.description: State or province for postal countries; county for Ireland (IE) and district code for Hong Kong (HK)

Urbanization.description:
Barrio for Mexico (MX)
Urbanization for Puerto Rico (PR)
Shire for United Kingdom (UK)

PostalCode.description: Postal code or equivalent for postal countries

CountryCode.description:
The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. 
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is commercial or residential. 
Valid values:
Y = Residential address
N = Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

PickupPoint.description: The specific spot to pickup at the address.

PickupAddress_StateProvince.description: State or province for postal countries; county for Ireland (IE) and district code for Hong Kong (HK)

PickupAddress_Urbanization.description:
Barrio for Mexico (MX)
Urbanization for Puerto Rico (PR)
Shire for United Kingdom (UK)

PickupAddress_PostalCode.description: Postal code or equivalent for postal countries

PickupAddress_ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is commercial or residential. 
Valid values:
Y = Residential address
N = Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

PickupAddress_PickupPoint.description: The specific spot to pickup at the address.

PickupCreationRequest_AlternateAddressIn.description:
Indicates if pickup address is a different address than that specified in a customer's profile. 
Valid values:
Y = Alternate address
N = Original pickup address (default)

ServiceCode.description: Refer to Service Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

Quantity.description:
Number of pieces to be picked up. 
Max per service: 999

DestinationCountryCode.description:
The destination country code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

ContainerCode.description:
Container type. 
Valid values:
01 = PACKAGE
02 = UPS LETTER
03 = PALLET
Note: 03 is used for only WWEF services

PickupCreationRequest_PickupPiece.description:
The container providing the information about how many items should be picked up. 
The total number of return and forwarding packages cannot exceed 9,999.

PickupPiece_Quantity.description:
Number of pieces to be picked up. 
Max per service: 999

PickupPiece_DestinationCountryCode.description:
The destination country code as defined by ISO-3166.
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.

PickupPiece_ContainerCode.description:
Container type. 
Valid values:
01 = PACKAGE
02 = UPS LETTER
03 = PALLET
Note: 03 is used for only WWEF services

Weight.description:
The weight of the package. 
One decimal digit is allowed. Example: 10.9

UnitOfMeasurement.description:
The code representing the unit of measurement associated with the package.
LBS = Pounds
KGS = Kilograms

PickupCreationRequest_TotalWeight.description: Container for the total weight of all the items.

TotalWeight_Weight.description:
The weight of the package. 
One decimal digit is allowed. Example: 10.9

TotalWeight_UnitOfMeasurement.description:
The code representing the unit of measurement associated with the package.
LBS = Pounds
KGS = Kilograms

PickupCreationRequest_OverweightIndicato.description:
Indicates if at least any package is over 70 lbs or 32 kgs. 
Valid values: 
Y = Over weight 
N = Not over weight (default)  Not required for WWEF service.

TrackingNumber.description: Tracking number for return shipment or forward shipment packages.  Tracking number(s) that have been previously used to pay for on-call pickup cannot be used again.

PickupCreationRequest_TrackingData.description:
Container for Return Service and Forward Tracking Numbers.  Accept no more than 30 TrackingData.

TrackingDataWithReferenceNumber and TrackingData container cannot be present at the same time.

TrackingData_TrackingNumber.description: Tracking number for return shipment or forward shipment packages.  Tracking number(s) that have been previously used to pay for on-call pickup cannot be used again.

ReferenceNumber.description: The reference number associated with the tracking number.

PickupCreationRequest_TrackingDataWithRe.description: Container for Tracking Number with its associated reference numbers.  This container should be populated to provide visibility into shipment tied to pickup being scheduled.  TrackingDataWithReferenceNumber and TrackingData container cannot be present at the same time.

TrackingDataWithReferenceNumber_Referenc.description: The reference number associated with the tracking number.

PickupCreationRequest_PaymentMethod.description:
The payment method to pay for this on call pickup.
00 = No payment needed
01 = Pay by shipper account
03 = Pay by charge card
04 = Pay by 1Z tracking number
05 = Pay by check or money order
06 = Cash(applicable only for these countries - BE,FR,DE,IT,MX,NL,PL,ES,GB,CZ,HU,FI,NO)
07=Pay by PayPal
Refer to Appendix # for valid payment methods for CZ, HU, FI and NO
  For countries and (or) zip codes where pickup is free of charge, please submit 00, means no payment needed as payment method. 
- If 01 is the payment method, then ShipperAccountNumber and ShipperAccount CountryCode must be provided.
- If 03 is selected, then CreditCard information should be provided.
- If 04 is selected, then the shipper agreed to pay for the pickup packages.
- If 05 is selected, then the shipper will pay for the pickup packages with a check or money order.

PickupCreationRequest_SpecialInstruction.description: Special handling instruction from the customer

PickupCreationRequest_ReferenceNumber.description: Information entered by a customer for Privileged reference

OriginServiceCenterCode.description: Origin SLIC. This will be obtained from submitting a pickup service center request. See PickupGetFacilitiesServiceCenterRequest.

OriginServiceCountryCode.description: Country or territory of Service Center SLIC chosen to drop off.

PickupCreationRequest_FreightOptions.description: Container will be used to indicate Service options, add optional Original service center, destination address and shipment details related to the UPS Worldwide Express Freight and UPS Worldwide Express Freight Midday.

OriginLiftGateIndicator.description: Presence indicates OriginLiftGateRequiredIndicator is present.  Conditionally requirements. Must not be present if DropOffAtUPSFacilityIndicator is true

DropoffAtUPSFacilityIndicator.description: Identifies service center location information for Origin List of UPS Facilities.

HoldForPickupIndicator.description: Identifies service center location information for Destination of UPS Facilities.

ShipmentServiceOptions_OriginLiftGateInd.description: Presence indicates OriginLiftGateRequiredIndicator is present.  Conditionally requirements. Must not be present if DropOffAtUPSFacilityIndicator is true

ShipmentServiceOptions_DropoffAtUPSFacil.description: Identifies service center location information for Origin List of UPS Facilities.

ShipmentServiceOptions_HoldForPickupIndi.description: Identifies service center location information for Destination of UPS Facilities.

FreightOptions_OriginServiceCenterCode.description: Origin SLIC. This will be obtained from submitting a pickup service center request. See PickupGetFacilitiesServiceCenterRequest.

FreightOptions_OriginServiceCountryCode.description: Country or territory of Service Center SLIC chosen to drop off.

City.description: The city of pickup address if available.  It is required for non-postal country Ireland (IE).

StateProvince.description:
1. It means district code for Hong Kong (HK)
2. It means county for Ireland (IE)
3. It means state or province for all the postal countries  It is required for non-postal countries including HK and IE.

PostalCode.description: Postal Code for postal countries.  It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK

CountryCode.description:
The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. 
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.  Upper-case two-letter string.

DestinationAddress_City.description: The city of pickup address if available.  It is required for non-postal country Ireland (IE).

DestinationAddress_StateProvince.description:
1. It means district code for Hong Kong (HK)
2. It means county for Ireland (IE)
3. It means state or province for all the postal countries  It is required for non-postal countries including HK and IE.

DestinationAddress_PostalCode.description: Postal Code for postal countries.  It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK

DestinationAddress_CountryCode.description:
The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. 
Refer to Country or Territory Codes in the Appendix for valid values.  Upper-case two-letter string.

FreightOptions_ShipmentDetail.description: Refers to the ShipmentDetail Container under Freight Options

Dimensions_UnitOfMeasurement.description: The code representing the unit of measurement associated with the package.

PickupCreationRequest_ServiceCategory.description:
Service Category.
Applicable to the following countries:
BE, FR, DE, IT, MX, NL, PL, ES, GB 
Valid values: 
01 - domestic (default)
02 - international
03 - transborder

PickupCreationRequest_CashType.description:
Describes the type of cash funds that the driver will collect.
Applicable to the following countries:
BE,FR,DE,IT,MX,NL,PL,ES,GB
Valid values: 
01 - Pickup only (default)
02 - Transportation only
03 - Pickup and Transportation

PickupCreationRequest_ShippingLabelsAvai.description: This element should be set to �Y� in the request to indicate that user has pre-printed shipping labels for all the packages, otherwise this will be treated as false.

PRN.description: Pickup Request Number generated by UPS pickup system when a successful pickup is scheduled.Same PRN will be returned if a pickup request already exists for a pickup address/ point.

WeekendServiceTerritoryIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 1607.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = WST
N = Non-WST

PickupCreationResponse.description: The response for scheduling an on-callpickup.

PickupCreationResponse_PRN.description: Pickup Request Number generated by UPS pickup system when a successful pickup is scheduled.Same PRN will be returned if a pickup request already exists for a pickup address/ point.

SatWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Saturday WST
N = Non-Saturday WST

SunWST.description:
Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Sunday and subversion greater or equal to 2007.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = Sunday WST
N = Non-Sunday WST

PickupCreationResponse_WeekendServiceTer.description: WeekendServiceTerritory Container.Returned if the  subversion greater or equal to 2007.

Indicates if the pickup address qualifies for WST (Weekend Service Territory). Returned if the pickup date is Saturday and subversion greater or equal to 1607.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Valid Values:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Y = WST
N = Non-WST

Code.description:
The rating status.
01 = Rate available
02 = Rate not available
03 = Rate not apply
04 = Rate not requested
- If 01 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will also be returned with rate details.
- If 02 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned.
- If 03 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned. The rate option is not appliable to this return pickup. The requester will not be charged.
- If 04 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned. The requester did not ask for rating this on-callpickup.

Description.description: The matching description of rating status code (see above).

RateStatus_Code.description:
The rating status.
01 = Rate available
02 = Rate not available
03 = Rate not apply
04 = Rate not requested
- If 01 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will also be returned with rate details.
- If 02 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned.
- If 03 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned. The rate option is not appliable to this return pickup. The requester will not be charged.
- If 04 is returned, then OnCallPickupRateResult will not be returned. The requester did not ask for rating this on-callpickup.

RateStatus_Description.description: The matching description of rating status code (see above).

RateType.description:
Indicates this pickup is rated as same-day or future-day pickup.
SD = Same-day Pickup
FD = Future-day Pickup

CurrencyCode.description: IATA currency codes for the pickup charge. Such as USD

GrandTotalOfAllCharge.description: The grand total of each charge and applied tax.

GrandTotalOfAllIncentedCharge.description: The grand total of each incented charge and applied tax. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

PreTaxTotalCharge.description: Total of charges before taxes. Only present when tax details requested in input.

PreTaxTotalIncentedCharge.description: Total of incented charges before taxes. Only present if 1. UserLevelDiscountIndicator = Y and User Level Promotion is applied to the pickup or 2 .if any incentive rate is applied to the pickup and SubVersion on the request is greater than or equal to 1707.

PickupCreationResponse_RateResult.description: The result of rating on-callpickup. It correlates to rate status code 01

Code.description:
Disclaimer code. 
Valid values: 
01 = Taxes are included in the shipping cost and apply to the transportation charges but additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
02 = Additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
 03 = Additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
04 = Taxes were unable to be determined and may apply to the shipment.
05 = Rate excludes VAT. Rate includes a fuel surcharge, but excludes taxes, duties and other charges that may apply to the shipment.

RateResult_Disclaimer.description: Container to hold Disclaimer message applicable to taxes and charges. Available only when tax information is requested.

Disclaimer_Code.description:
Disclaimer code. 
Valid values: 
01 = Taxes are included in the shipping cost and apply to the transportation charges but additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
02 = Additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
 03 = Additional duties/taxes may apply and are not reflected in the total amount due.
04 = Taxes were unable to be determined and may apply to the shipment.
05 = Rate excludes VAT. Rate includes a fuel surcharge, but excludes taxes, duties and other charges that may apply to the shipment.

CountryCode.description: Specifies the country for which the list of Political Division 1 will be returned if available.

PickupGetPoliticalDivision1ListRequest.description: This request is for client to get a list of valid Political Division 1s/State field for a specific country or territory

PickupGetPoliticalDivision1ListRequest_C.description: Specifies the country for which the list of Political Division 1 will be returned if available.

PickupGetPoliticalDivision1ListResponse.description: The response for getting a list of valid Political Division 1 or State field in the specified country or territory.

Locale.description:
Origin Country or Territory Locale.  Locale should be Origin Country. Example: en_US. 
The Last 50 instruction will be send based on this locale. Locale is required if PoximityIndicator is present for Drop Off facilities.

ProximitySearchIndicator.description: Proximity Indicator.  Indicates the� user requested the proximity search for UPS Worldwide Express Freight and UPS Worldwide Express Freight Midday locations for the origin address and/or the airport code, and the sort code for destination address.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest.description: This request is to retrieve UPS Facility location information including location address, phone number, SLIC, and hours of operation for pick-up and drop-off requests

ServiceCode.description:
The service code.
96 = WWEF  Required for WWEF shipments.

ContainerCode.description:
The container type
03 = PALLET  Required for WWEF shipments.

PickupPiece_ServiceCode.description:
The service code.
96 = WWEF  Required for WWEF shipments.

StreetAddress.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

City.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

StateProvince.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory is US/CA/IE/HK.

PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory has postal code.It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK.

CountryCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest_.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required for drop off location search.

OriginAddress_StreetAddress.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

OriginAddress_City.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

OriginAddress_StateProvince.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory is US/CA/IE/HK.

OriginAddress_PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory has postal code.It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK.

OriginAddress_CountryCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search

SearchRadius.description:
Search Request range.
Valied values: 1 to 200
Default: 200

DistanceUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of Measure  Required if ProximitySearchIndicator is present. Example: MI or KM

MaximumLocation.description:
Maximum Number of locations.
Valied values: 1 to 100
Default: 100

OriginAddress_OriginSearchCriteria.description: Origin Search Criteria Container  Required if Proximity SearchIndicator is present.

OriginSearchCriteria_SearchRadius.description:
Search Request range.
Valied values: 1 to 200
Default: 200

OriginSearchCriteria_MaximumLocation.description:
Maximum Number of locations.
Valied values: 1 to 100
Default: 100

City.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.  Required for non-postal country Ireland (IE).

StateProvince.description:
Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.
1 = District code for Hong Kong (HK)
2 = County for Ireland (IE)
3 = State or province for all the postal countries  Required for non-postal countries including HK and IE.

PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search  It does not apply to non-postal countries. Example: IE and HK.

CountryCode.description: The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. Please check check separate pickup country or territory list to find out all the pickup eligible countries.

Specify the type of pending pickup.
01 = On-Call Pickup

Specify the type of pending pickup.
01 = On-Call Pickup

PickupType.description:
Specify the type of pending pickup.
01 = on-callPickup

ServiceDate.description:
Local service date
Format: yyyyMMdd
yyyy = Year applicable
MM = 01� 12
dd = 01� 31

OnCallStatusCode.description: A unique string identifier to identify a success pre-notification processing. Only available if end result is success.

PickupStatusMessage.description:
The status for on-callpickup.
PickupPendingStatusResponse will only display incomplete status for today and tomorrow only. 
002 and 012 are the most common responses.
001 = Received at dispatch
002 = Dispatched to driver
003 = Order successfully completed
004 = Order unsuccessfully completed
005 = Missed commit � Updated ETA supplied by driver
007 = Cancelled
008 = Order has invalid order status
012 = Your pickup request is being processed

BillingCode.description:
Pickup billing classification for on call
01 = Regular
02 = Return
03 = Alternate Address (Not supported for now)

ReferenceNumber.description: Customer provided reference number for on-call pickup
